20110128040633.000|20110128040634.000|CC1|ON THEIR OWN THEY WON'T BE IN   
20110128040634.000|20110128040636.000|CC1|THE UNITED STATES SENATE.       
20110128040636.000|20110128040638.000|CC1|>> JUDSON PHILLIPS, DO YOU      
20110128040638.000|20110128040639.000|CC1|ACCEPT MARCO RUBIO'S SPINNING   
20110128040639.000|20110128040641.000|CC1|ABOUT WHY HE COULDN'T GO TO THE 
20110128040641.000|20110128040642.000|CC1|HART SENATE OFFICE BUILDING     
20110128040642.000|20110128040643.000|CC1|TODAY AND SHOW UP FOR A TEA     
20110128040643.000|20110128040645.000|CC1|PARTY MEETING?                  
20110128040645.000|20110128040647.000|CC1|>> OH, ABSOLUTELY.

20110128043028.000|20110128043031.000|CC1|              WHOA.             
20110128043031.000|20110128043034.000|CC1|     CAN WE CALL HIM BLINKY?    
20110128043034.000|20110128043034.000|CC1|      - Announcer:              
20110128043034.000|20110128043034.000|CC1|        EXPERT TEACHING.
